title: Essay on Climate Change
description: Write a 1000-word essay discussing the impacts of climate change and potential solutions.

title: Math Problems - Chapter 3
description: Solve problems 1 to 20 from chapter 3 of the textbook.

title: Programming Assignment
description: Write a Python program that calculates prime numbers up to 1000.

title: Scientific Presentation
description: Create a presentation on the process of photosynthesis in plants.

title: Advanced Math Problems
description: Solve advanced mathematical problems involving calculus and linear algebra.

title: Historical Event Report
description: Write a report on the causes and consequences of World War II.

title: Python Coding Challenge
description: Solve a series of coding challenges using Python within a time limit.

title: Social Issue Video
description: Create a 5-minute video discussing a relevant social issue in your community.

title: Physics Problems
description: Solve physics problems related to motion and energy conservation.

title: Literature Review
description: Write a literature review on the novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird' by Harper Lee.

title: Chemistry Problems
description: Solve chemistry problems related to chemical reactions and stoichiometry.

title: Environmental Poster
description: Create an informative poster on the impact of plastic pollution on marine life.
